my favorite show is scobby doo.

participant_2.background:
I'm adjusting to college life and still trying to find my way around.
i like to go to the casino on weekends.
My most valuable thing is my ability to stay humble, even in the face of great wealth.
I spend my spare time watching TV and working on my gaming startup.
I try to distract myself with music or by reading a book.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there!
What are you up to today?
Not much. Trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
I know how that feels. I'm in my last year of grad school and I'm not sure what I want to do with my life either.
What are you studying?
I'm studying environmental science.
Oh cool! I'm trying to start my own gaming startup.
That's really cool! What kind of games are you making?
I'm making a game that's like Minecraft but with a sci-fi twist.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to play Minecraft but I've never had the time.
You should check it out! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go fishing, walk my dog, and watch Scooby Doo.
Scooby Doo! That's a classic! I used to watch that all the time when I was a kid.
Me too! It's still one of my favorite shows.
I'm glad to hear that! It's a good show.
Yeah, it is. So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go to the casino, watch TV, and work on my gaming startup.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I had the time to do all of those things.
You should make some time! It's important to have fun and relax.
I know, you're right. I'll try to make some time for fun.
Good! You deserve it.
Thanks
